item.title: If you had the power to change one person's life, how would you do it?
item.description: Often you hear people say, “if this can save just one life, it’ll be worth it.” This, I’ve always felt, was something of a platitude. Let’s face it; if one spends ten million dollars trying to solve some severe and life-threatening issue, and the net result is “one life saved”, then it’s not exactly a fantastic result. Was it worth the ten million dollars?
